# Test Domains for Cert-Monitor v2.0 Experiments
# Format: domain (one per line)
# Lines starting with # are comments

# High-traffic domains - should all pass

youtube.com
facebook.com
amazon.com
twitter.com
instagram.com
linkedin.com
microsoft.com
apple.com
github.com
stackoverflow.com
reddit.com
netflix.com
cloudflare.com
wordpress.com

# Banking/Financial - critical security
paypal.com
stripe.com
chase.com
bankofamerica.com
wellsfargo.com

# Known good SSL configurations
badssl.com
sha256.badssl.com
sha384.badssl.com
sha512.badssl.com
ecc256.badssl.com
ecc384.badssl.com
rsa2048.badssl.com
rsa4096.badssl.com
rsa8192.badssl.com
extended-validation.badssl.com
mozilla-modern.badssl.com

# Short-lived certificates (Let's Encrypt)
letsencrypt.org
certbot.eff.org

# CDN-backed domains
jquery.com
cdnjs.com
unpkg.com
jsdelivr.net
